cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.image.title: Image Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.image.description: Image objects with acquisition details and component type classification. Typed as ada:image and schema:ImageObject.

illuminationType.description: Type of illumination used to create the image. Examples include Visible light, Cross-polarized visible light, ultraviolet light, Electron beam, X-ray.

imageType.description: Specifies the nature of the sample's response to the illumination that was detected and measured.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.imageMap.title: Image Map Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.imageMap.description: Spatially registered image maps with pixel coordinates, component type classification, and spatial registration metadata.

illuminationType.description: Type of illumination used to create the image.

imageType.description: Specifies the nature of the sample's response to the illumination.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.tabularD.title: Tabular Data Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.tabularD.description: Tabular data type aligned with CDIF 2026 schema using DDI-CDI and CSVW properties. Typed as cdi:TabularTextDataSet and ada:tabularData.

csvw:commentPrefix.description: An atomic property that sets the comment prefix flag to the single provided value, which MUST be a string. The default is '#'.

csvw:delimiter.description: Sets the delimiter flag to the single provided value, which MUST be a string. The default is ','.

csvw:header.description: If true, sets the header row count flag to 1, and if false to 0, unless headerRowCount is provided, in which case the value provided for the header property is ignored. The default is true.

csvw:headerRowCount.description: A numeric atomic property that sets the header row count flag to the single provided value, which MUST be a non-negative integer.

cdi:isDelimited.description: Schema constraint is that one of {'isDelimited','isFixedWidth'} must be present with a True value; the other one may be present or omitted, but if present must have a false value.

csvw:quoteChar.description: Same as DDI-CDI quoteCharacter. The string that is used around escaped cells.

csvw:skipColumns.description: The number of columns to skip at the beginning of each row.

csvw:skipRows.description: The number of rows to skip at the beginning of the file, before a header row or tabular data.

cdi:hasPhysicalMapping.description: Links variables to their physical representation in this dataset.

xCoordCol.description: The column names are redundant, they are lists in the hasPhysicalMapping array. Include here for convenience.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.collecti.title: Collection Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.collecti.description: A collection can be a set of files with identical information model and serialization/formatting, or a heterogeneous set of files that together constitute a dataset (a composite dataset).

memberTypes.description: List of the component types in the collection

nFiles.description: Number of files in the collection, including metadata files

fileName.description: Full path to file in container object

fileNamePattern.description: Pattern for collection members with differentiating suffix at '*'

componentType.description: The component type for the file(s)

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.dataCube.title: Data Cube Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.dataCube.description: Multi-dimensional data cube structure using DDI-CDI. Typed as ada:dataCube and cdi:StructuredDataSet per CDIF 2026 alignment.

cdi:hasPhysicalMapping.description: Links variables to their physical representation in this dataset.

cdi:locator.description: String that can be used by software to locate values of the variable in this physical dataset.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.document.title: Document Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.document.description: Text or PDF/A documents providing supplemental information, typically related to calibration, instrument metadata details, analysis methods, or data representation. Typed as ada:document and schema:DigitalDocument.

componentType.description: One of the supplemental document types if applicable

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.supDocIm.title: Supplemental Document Image Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.supDocIm.description: Supplemental document images including analysis location images, annotated products, context photography, and other supplemental visual materials.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.otherFil.title: Other File Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.otherFil.description: Files in other widely-used formats approved for submission to the Astromat Archive. Includes EMSA, OBJ, STL, XLSX, and Neptune Plus export formats.

schema:encodingFormat.description: One of the approved non-standard file formats

formatDescription.description: Free text explanation of file format, or a link to a publicly accessible specification for the format.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailEM.title: EMPA Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailEM.description: Electron Microprobe Analysis with spectrometer and signal details.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.spatialR.title: Spatial Registration Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.spatialR.description: Defines pixel coordinate system registration including origin coordinates, pixel scales, and coordinate definition type for spatially registered images and maps.

basemap.description: link to appropriate basemap image map

coordDef.description: Whether coordinates are stage-defined or pixel-defined. If pixel-defined, are coordinates from stage, upperleftPixel, or centerPixel.

originLocation.description: The location of the origin pixel of an image. Range: upperLeft, upperRight, lowerLeft, lowerRight, center

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailDS.title: DSC Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailDS.description: Differential Scanning Calorimetry heat tabular data

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailEA.title: EA-IRMS Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailEA.description: Elemental Analysis Isotope Ratio Mass Spectrometry collection

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailLA.title: LAF Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailLA.description: Laser Ablation Fluorescence processed/raw data. elementAnalyzed goes in resultTarget.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailNa.title: NanoSIMS Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailNa.description: Nano Secondary Ion Mass Spectrometry with isotope tracking

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailNa.title: NanoIR Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailNa.description: Nano-IR spectroscopy collections with phase analysis

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailPS.title: PSFD Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailPS.description: Point Spread Function Data with image names and conditions

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailVN.title: VNMIR Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailVN.description: Very-Near Mid-IR spectroscopy with detailed measurement parameters

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailXR.title: XRD Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailXR.description: X-ray Diffraction tabular data with geometry and wavelength

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.physical.title: Physical Mapping Type
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.physical.description: Defines implementation-specific properties for the representation of a variable in a dataset. Aligned with CDIF 2026 schema using DDI-CDI flat per-column mapping structure.

cdi:index.description: Non-negative integer that orders the fields in the data structure (column number).

cdi:format.description: A format for number expressed as a string, or date format like YYYY/MM or MM-DD-YY.

cdi:length.description: The column width if the tabular text is fixed width.

cdi:nullSequence.description: The value of this property becomes the null annotation for the described column.

cdi:defaultValue.description: A default string indicating the value to substitute for an empty string.

cdi:formats_InstanceVariable.description: Reference to a variable defined in schema:variableMeasured.

@id.description: This should be a reference to a variable defined in the schema:variableMeasured section.

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailL2.title: L2MS Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailL2.description: Laser-2 Mass Spectrometry cube data with ionization parameters

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailAR.title: ARGT Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailAR.description: ARGT (Argon) document type with phase and isotope analysis

cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailSL.title: SLS Instrument Detail
cdif.bbr.metadata.adaProperties.detailSL.description: Structured Light Scanning shape models and partial scans

title: Has Part File Type
description: Files within an archive package (hasPart). Uses CDIF 2026 distribution patterns with DDI-CDI types. The @type must NOT contain schema:DataDownload (distinguishing hasPart files from top-level distribution files). File-type details are merged via allOf rather than nested in fileDetail.

schema:name.description: String name of file, must be unique within the containing package
